title: Chat Restricted, Ranked Restricted or Game Banned during the Season will not receive Season Rewards

embed.description: We are still working on the details for the 2015 Season, but the current plan is that players who have been Chat Restricted, Ranked Restricted or Game Banned during the 2015 Season will not receive Season Rewards in Ranked. Players who have had Low Priority Queues won't be affected unless they have had 20 min Low Priority Queues.

replies.body: that's so dumb tbh. no ranked rewards if you get punished for a system that's completely automatic and easy as fuck to abuse.
I reckon this is good except for the 20 minute low priority queue part. Unfortunately things happen and I dont think people who are pulled away from games should be punished

if you dont have the time, you shouldn't play the game

it comes down to consideration for other people.

Game crashing, pc crashing, internet crashing, having a shared pc and having to switch comps so someone can use it (common with families), being called away unexpectently and then coming back shortly later. All of these are unexpected things that can happen at random and the unfortunate people usually return within 5-10 minutes (in my experience) but get punished for it.

I agree completely. Despite your intentions, you are ruining the game for 9 other people. If its happening often enough to get a 20 minute queue restriction and you still haven't done anything about it, then it's your fault. Get a new computer, find out whats causing crashes, pick better times to play when family wont need the computer, whatever.

I've never quit a game ever. The only times I've ever abandoned matches were either because of net cuts and bugsplats. Of course I reconnect as soon as possible which usually is 5mins after dcing at most. Majority of my dc's have been mid-way through the game which I would say is much better than dcing at the start of a match, thus the team having the advantage the may have been built and 4v5ing for 5mins. It's really sad if this does go through after all the hard work I put into ranked to get diamond... I'm sure a a lot of players can relate to this after achieving the rank they aimed for only to get nothing, I've only dc'ed about 10 games out of my 350+ ranked games and they were weeks or even months apart from each other and unfortunately I received the 20min low priority queue. I was just really look forward to receiving the rewards after friends making fun of me since I'm the only one not diamond yet, I thought I'd show them I could do it... Literally wasted a year. This is something that shouldn't be enforced halfway through the season either, it would make more sense to input it at the start of a season to warn people about the consequences of these penalties and avoid them.
Well f**k... No rewards for me lmao, you get punished once and it just slaps you every game after that :'(
